text: are you looking for a relatively healthy
SuperDuper fantastically delightful
snack today I'm making a cheesy popcorn
couldn't be easier
all you need to do is take six cups of
popped popcorn this is actually a double
recipe so just if you go online and you
look at the recipe and you're like what
is she doing it's cuz I'm doubling it
two tablespoons of very finely grated
Parmesan cheese I like to use the rasp
grater for grating cheese for this
because it's very light and fluffy and
it'll stick to the popcorn better I
think you can use an unflavored bag of
popcorn and flavour it like I'm doing or
you could make your own popcorn which is
really easy by the way couple teaspoons
of olive oil 1/2 a teaspoon of thyme
this is dry thyme you're seasoning
something like popcorn you don't need
fresh herbs you could use them I suppose
now the original recipe calls for a
quarter teaspoon of dry garlic which is
an ingredient I almost never used
because I find it very strong so I'm
gonna use it but I'm not going to quite
double it for this and then about 1/2 a
teaspoon of salt I'm not using too much
salt because there's lots of parmesan
and then you just toss clearly this is
something that you could double triple
quadruple King to bowl anything that you
want and then it'll last for a couple of
days in an airtight container and
whenever you want it delicious snack
open it up and enjoy
you
